page.title: 20CREDITS.
page.content:
This information was prepared by members of Adlington Womens Institute including the following:-
Pat Beale, Mary Burt, Julie Clarke, Eileen Cleaver, Alison Dowell, Isabel Drynan, Alison Fazackerly, Marjorie Greenhalgh, Doreen Hancock, Pam Holland, Mary Houseman, Marjorie McHugh, Susan Neary, Muriel Schofield, Carole Taylor. The Institute also acknowledges the assistance of the North West Water Authority and Macclesfield Borough Council. Help was also given by Mr. Brian Schofield, Maurice Goulding, Frank Bruckshaw and families and friends of the members.
